page.title: 13IRVINE* PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
{CHINESE ROPES _}This is a rope made of rubber bands and one person holds each end. The 'enders' move the rope to different levels of their body and the jumpers jump the rope.
{TAG _}There are different types of tag, in all of them one person is 'het' and they run around trying to touch someone else.If you are touched or 'tagged', depending on what sort of tag you are playing, you might join a string of others, put your arm against the wall waiting for someone to go under the arch you have made, or run around holding the place where you were tagged.
{HIDE AND SEEK _}One person is seeker and the rest hide, the seeker has to find them after counting to a certain number.
